properties.address: Bourne End Library, Bourne End, ENG SL8 5SX
properties.description: A welcoming, safe space to stay warm, read, study, use our public access PC's (1 hour free for library members per day) or free Wi-fi and meet others. We have board games and jigsaws available, plus books....lots of books !

properties.title: Café Refresh

properties.address: Caversham Baptist Church, Reading, Berkshire RG4 8HY
properties.description: Open on Fridays, 10:00-13:30. Everyone welcome to our cafe style space; all refreshments free of charge. Tea, coffee and cakes provided. Hot soup and rolls served from 12:00. A friendly place to come and meet others and chat, with a place for quiet contemplation for those who would like. Subject to availability, there is free food to take away, provided by the Co-op Foodshare scheme.
properties.title: Caversham Warm Welcome Space

properties.address: Christ Church URC, Marlow, Buckinghamshire SL7 2NL
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 4th December 2023** A warm, welcoming, safe space where you can chat, play board games, do puzzles, read, knit and more.... We will be providing self service hot drinks, and soup and a roll for lunch. **Open on Mondays from 4 December from 10 am - 2pm. Marlow Library, Institute Road, Marlow SL7 1BL will be open as a warm, welcoming space from Tuesday to Saturday.
properties.title: Christ Church United Refomed Church Marlow

properties.address: Christ Church, Flackwell Heath, Buckinghamshire HP10 9AA
properties.description: Coffee Stop is open every weekday morning during term time, and offers warm drinks and a warm welcome for all in the community. There's no charge (although donations are welcome) and there's always someone to talk to. If you're looking for somewhere warm over the winter, you'd be so welcome at Coffee Stop.
properties.title: Coffee Stop at Christ Church

properties.address: Heath End Road, Flackwell Heath, Bucks HP10 9DT
properties.description: We are a church at the heart of the community, sharing Jesus's love in practical ways. We run a play group on Wednesday and Friday mornings term time; coffee morning every Saturday and a pay as you can hot lunch on the first Sunday of every month.
properties.title: Flackwell Heath Methodist Church
